chapter10

Class TriPrism

  • java.lang.Object
    • chapter10.Shape
      • chapter10.ThreeDimensional
        • chapter10.TriPrism

  • public class TriPrism
extends ThreeDimensional

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TriPrism()
      TriPrism initializes length to 1 and triangle to a new Triangle object
      TriPrism(double length, Triangle triangle)
      TriPrism initializes length to the length value pass as an argument and triangle to a copy of the Triangle object passed as an argument.
      TriPrism(TriPrism triprism)
      TriPrism initializes all the fields to a copy of values of the Triangle object being passed as an argument

    • Constructor Detail

      • TriPrism

        public TriPrism()
        TriPrism initializes length to 1 and triangle to a new Triangle object

      • TriPrism

        public TriPrism(double length,
                Triangle triangle)
        TriPrism initializes length to the length value pass as an argument and triangle to a copy of the Triangle object passed as an argument. It also sets sides to 3 and faces to 6.
        Parameters:
        length - - the length of the triprism
        triangle - - a Triangle object

      • TriPrism

        public TriPrism(TriPrism triprism)
        TriPrism initializes all the fields to a copy of values of the Triangle object being passed as an argument
        Parameters:
        triprism - - a TriPrism object
